name: Mudul's Trial
description:
You play as Mudul-43, a robot programmed to fight endless waves of aliens in a closed arena. You can upgrade yourself with terminals but nothing is free and you must put the price.

How long will you last before getting overwhelmed by the aliens' hordes ?

--------------------------

We've made this game in 72h on the occasion of the Ludum Dare 43. We are french students in a video game school. We've made it with our heart so we hope you'll like it.
